newsitem.title: UK: TELECOM CORP NZ SETS NZ$100 MLN TWO-YEAR EUROBOND.
newsitem.headline: TELECOM CORP NZ SETS NZ$100 MLN TWO-YEAR EUROBOND.

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager
BORROWER TELECOM CORP OF NEW ZEALAND
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 100.88 PAY DATE 17.SEP.97
FULL FEES 1.25 LISTING LUX PAY FREQ ANNUAL
NOTES DEAL LAUNCHED IN NAME OF TCNZ FINANCE LTD GUARANTEED
BY TELECOM CORP OF NEW ZEALAND
